text: qal sheyb: ya qawm 'ara'aytum 'iin kunt ealaa tariq wadih min rabiy fima 'adeukum 'iilayh min 'ikhlas alebadt lh, wfyma 'anhakum eanh min 'ifsad almal, warazaqani minh rzqana waseana halalana tybana? wama 'urid 'an 'ukhalifakum fartkb amrana nhytkm enh, wama 'urid fima amrkm bih wanhakm eanh 'iilaa 'islahkm qadr taqty wasttaety, wama tawfiqi -fy 'iisabat alhaqu wamuhawalat 'islahkm- 'iilaa ballh, ealaa allah wahdah tawakalt wa'iilayh 'arjie baltwbt wal'inabt
